descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset contains around 2000 news articles scraped from ANI News. This dataset can be used for everything from building efficient recommender systems to sentiment analysis.


### Content

For every news article following information can be found under various columns : 
- Heading : Heading of the news article
- Link  : Link to that news article
- Body : Main body
- Timestamp : When was the given news article published on [ANI news](https://aninews.in/)
- Tags : Some tags associated with that news article.




### Acknowledgements

This dataset was collected from [ANI news](https://aninews.in/)


### DIY
 If you want to build a similar dataset refer to [Github](https://github.com/nikitaagarwala16/Scraping-ANI-news)
title: News Dataset (2020)
